headline: Simon速 to Present at Citi's 2026 Global Property CEO Conference
summary: Simon速, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, announced today that the Company will present at Citi's 2026 Global Property CEO Conference on Tuesday, March 3, 2026 at 3:35 p.m. Eastern Time.
